channel.title: CVE Feed for The CSSIgniter Team -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The CSSIgniter Team -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-47351|2024-10-16T15:48:36.582Z -- the%20cssigniter%20team -- maxslider
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in The CSSIgniter Team MaxSlider allows Path Traversal.This issue affects MaxSlider: from n/a through 1.2.3.
